simple_math module¶

A collection of simple math operations: - simple_add for addition of two numbers a and b - simple_sub for subtraction of two numbers a and b - simple_mult for multiplication of two numbers a and b - simple_div for division of two numbers a and b - poly_first for a first degree polynomial - poly_second for a second degree polynomial

simple_math.poly_first(x, a0, a1)¶

Evaluating a first degree polynomial y = a0 + a1*x. :param a0: :type a0: integer :param Intercept.: :param ——-: :param a1: :type a1: integer :param Gain.: :param ——-: :param x: :type x: integer :param Point of evaluation.:

Examples

>>> simple_math.poly_first(1,1,1)
2
>>> simple_math.poly_first(3,2,1)
5
simple_math.poly_second(x, a0, a1, a2)¶

Evaluating a second degree polynomial y = a0 + a1*x + a2*(x^2). :param a0: :type a0: integer :param Intercept.: :param ——-: :param a1: :type a1: integer :param Parameter for first degree x.: :param ——-: :param a1: :type a1: integer :param Parameter for second degree x^2.: :param ——-: :param x: :type x: integer :param Point of evaluation.:

Examples

>>> simple_math.poly_first(1,1,1)
2
>>> simple_math.poly_first(3,2,1)
5
simple_math.simple_add(a, b)¶

Calculating the sum of two numbers a and b. :param a: :type a: integer :param First number to be added.: :param ——-: :param b: :type b: integer :param Second number to be added.:

Examples

>>> simple_math.simple_add(1,1)
2
>>> simple_math.simple_add(3,2)
5
simple_math.simple_div(a, b)¶

Dividing a by b. :param a: :type a: integer :param First number.: :param ——-: :param b: :type b: integer :param Second number.:

Examples

>>> simple_math.simple_div(1,1)
1
>>> simple_math.simple_div(3,2)
1.5
simple_math.simple_mult(a, b)¶

Multiplying a with b. :param a: :type a: integer :param First number.: :param ——-: :param b: :type b: integer :param Second number.:

Examples

>>> simple_math.simple_mult(1,1)
1
>>> simple_math.simple_mult(3,2)
6
simple_math.simple_sub(a, b)¶

Subtracting number b from number a. :param a: :type a: integer :param First number to be added.: :param ——-: :param b: :type b: integer :param Second number to be subtracted.:

Examples

>>> simple_math.simple_sub(1,1)
0
>>> simple_math.simple_sub(3,2)
1
